user.title: Solar AC Controller setup
user.description:
Configure how the controller manages your AC zones based on solar production and grid usage.

Fields are grouped:
1. What to Control: AC zones and optional master switch
2. Sensors: Solar, grid, and AC power meters
3. When to Activate: Solar thresholds for on/off
4. Decision Tuning: Confidence and learned power
5. Optional Features: Enable seasonal and comfort modes

All settings can be adjusted later from Options. Supports cooling and heating zones (heat / cool / on).

data_description.ac_power_sensor: Sensor that reports the AC unit's current power draw.
data_description.outside_temperature_sensor: Optional outside temperature for auto season and banded learning.
data_description.ac_switch: Optional switch that powers the AC system. Leave empty if unmanaged.
data_description.zones: List of climate or switch entities to control. Order determines activation priority.
data_description.initial_learned_power: Starting estimate of zone power before learning.
data_description.solar_threshold_on: Solar power must exceed this to enable the AC master switch.
data_description.solar_threshold_off: Solar power must fall below this to disable the master switch.
data_description.heat_on_below: Auto season: enable heating when outside is below this.
data_description.heat_off_above: Auto season: stop heating when outside rises above this.
data_description.cool_on_above: Auto season: enable cooling when outside is above this.
data_description.cool_off_below: Auto season: stop cooling when outside falls below this.
data_description.very_cold_threshold: Temperature at or below this is very cold. Used for better learning needed power in each season.
data_description.chilly_threshold: Temperature between this and very cold threshold is chilly. Used for better learning needed power in each season.
data_description.comfortable_threshold: Temperature between this and chilly threshold is comfortable. Above this is very hot. Used for better learning needed power in each season.
data_description.enable_auto_season: Automatically choose heat/cool/neutral based on outside temperature sensor. Requires outside temperature sensor.
data_description.enable_temperature_modulation: Requires zone temperature sensors. Blocks zone removal until comfort targets are reached (winter max/summer min).
data_description.master_switch_in_offseason: When auto-season detects neutral/offseason (neither heat nor cool needed), keep AC master switch ON despite low solar. Uncheck to turn OFF during offseason.
data_description.max_temp_winter: Heating comfort cutoff; zones stay on until reaching this temperature in heat mode.
data_description.min_temp_summer: Cooling comfort cutoff; zones stay on until reaching this temperature in cool mode.
data_description.zone_temp_sensors: Mapping from each zone to its indoor temperature sensor. Used with temperature modulation to prevent premature zone removal.
data_description.panic_threshold: If grid import exceeds this for panic_delay seconds with multiple zones active, zones are shed sequentially.
data_description.panic_delay: Seconds of sustained high import before panic shedding begins.
data_description.manual_lock_seconds: If user manually toggles a zone via Home Assistant UI, it is locked from controller changes for this duration.
data_description.short_cycle_on_seconds: Minimum time a zone must stay ON before controller can turn it OFF (prevents rapid cycling).
data_description.short_cycle_off_seconds: Minimum time a zone must stay OFF before controller can turn it ON (prevents rapid cycling).
data_description.action_delay_seconds: Minimum delay between consecutive zone commands (including heat/cool mode changes) to avoid rapid sequencing.
data_description.add_confidence: Minimum confidence score needed to add a new zone. Higher = more conservative.
data_description.remove_confidence: Minimum negative confidence score needed to remove a zone. Higher = harder to remove.

error.no_zones: You must define at least one zone.
error.zone_temp_sensors_mismatch: Number of zone temperature sensors must match number of zones (or leave empty).
error.invalid_solar_hysteresis: Solar OFF threshold must be lower than Solar ON threshold.
error.invalid_heat_hysteresis: Heat OFF must be above Heat ON.
error.invalid_cool_hysteresis: Cool ON must be above Cool OFF.
error.invalid_bands: Temperature thresholds must increase (very cold < chilly < comfortable).
error.panic_too_low: Panic threshold should be safely above the Solar ON threshold.
